1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 Code.
4 """
5 import sys
6 import rospy
7 import rospkg
8 import numpy as np
9 from std_msgs.msg import Float64
10 from sensor_msgs.msg import JointState
11 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectory, JointTrajectoryPoint
12 from RobotControllerManager import RobotControllerManager, ControllerType
13 
14 sys.path.append(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin'))
15 from scripts.exceptions import InvalidNumJointException, InvalidTrajectoryCommandException # noqa:E402
16 
17 
18 class RobotArm(object):
19  """
20  Generic robot arm implementation in ROS. Works for n joints.
21  """
22 
23  def __init__(self, num_joints,
24  is_sim=True, joint_states_topic='/joint_states',
25  ignore_joints_arr=['panda_finger_joint1', 'panda_finger_joint2'],
26  controller_names=None):
27  """
28  intialization of the robot arm class.
29 
30  `controller_names` should have:
31 
32  `controller_names[0]` - position controllers
33 
34  `controller_names[1]` - velocity controllers
35 
36  `controllers_names[2]` - ONE trajectory controller.
37  """
38 
39  self.num_joints = num_joints
40  if controller_names is None:
41  controller_names = []
42  default_pos_names = ['panda_joint{}_position_controller'.format(i) for i in range(1, num_joints+1)]
43  default_vel_names = ['panda_joint{}_velocity_controller'.format(i) for i in range(1, num_joints+1)]
44  default_traj_name = ['panda_joint_trajectory_controller' if is_sim else 'joint_trajectory_controller']
45  controller_names.append(default_pos_names)
46  controller_names.append(default_vel_names)
47  controller_names.append(default_traj_name)
48 
49  # create the controller manager for switching controllers.
50  self.controller_manager = RobotControllerManager(controller_names)
51 
52  self.ignore_joints_arr = ignore_joints_arr
53  self.data_exists = False
54  self.joint_data = None
55  self.names = None
56  self.positions = None
57 
58  # get list of position and velocity publishers ... and trajectory publisher.
59  self.pos_pubs, self.vel_pubs, self.traj_pub = self.get_publishers(controller_names)
60 
61  rospy.Subscriber(joint_states_topic, JointState, self.joint_state_callback)
62  # need a sleep, so message is sent from publisher, interestingly.
63  rospy.sleep(2)
64 
65  def joint_names(self):
66  """
67  get the joint names of the robot
68  """
69  if self.data_exists:
70  return self.names
71  else:
72  return []
73 
74  def joint_angles(self):
75  """
76  gets the joint angles of the robot arm
77  """
78  if self.data_exists:
79  return np.array(self.joint_data.position)[self.valid_indices]
80  else:
81  return []
82 
83  def joint_velocities(self):
84  """
85  gets the joint velocities of the robot arm
86  """
87  if self.data_exists:
88  return np.array(self.joint_data.velocity)[self.valid_indices]
89  else:
90  return []
91 
92  def joint_angle(self, joint_name):
93  """
94  gets the joint angle based on the provided joint name.
95 
96  returns nan if data does not exist (from the callback)
97  """
98  if self.data_exists:
99  angles = self.joint_angles()
100  return angles[self.mapping[joint_name]]
101  else:
102  return np.nan
103 
104  def joint_velocity(self, joint_name):
105  """
106  gets the joint velocity based on the provided joint name.
107 
108  returns nan if data does not exist (from the callback)
109  """
110  if self.data_exists:
111  velocities = self.joint_velocities()
112  return velocities[self.mapping[joint_name]]
113  else:
114  return np.nan
115 
116  def set_joint_position_speed(self, speed=1.0):
117  rospy.logerr('Set Joint Position Speed Not Implemented for Robot Arm')
118 
119  def move_to_joint_positions(self, positions, sleep=1.0, timeout=15.0):
120  """
121  moves robot to specific joint positions.
122  """
123  if len(positions) != self.num_joints:
124  raise InvalidNumJointException("Wrong number of joints for pos control.")
125 
126  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
127  self.controller_manager.switch_mode(ControllerType.POSITION)
128  for index, pos in enumerate(positions):
129  self.pos_pubs[index].publish(Float64(pos))
130  rospy.sleep(sleep)
131 
132  def set_joint_velocities(self, velocities):
133  """
134  affects the set joint velocities
135  """
136 
137  if len(velocities) != self.num_joints:
138  raise InvalidNumJointException("Wrong number of joints for vel control.")
139 
140  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
141  self.controller_manager.switch_mode(ControllerType.VELOCITY)
142  for index, vel in enumerate(velocities):
143  self.vel_pubs[index].publish(Float64(vel))
144 
145  def set_joint_trajectory(self, trajectories, time_per_step=1.0):
146  """
147  sends a joint trajectory command.
148  """
149  # 3d tensor of shape (3, n_joint, n_point)
150  points_tensor = np.array(trajectories)
151 
152  if len(points_tensor.shape) != 3:
153  raise InvalidTrajectoryCommandException("Trajectory should be of 3-d shape!")
154  if points_tensor.shape[1] != 3:
155  raise InvalidTrajectoryCommandException("3 rows should be provided for pos, vel and acc.")
156  if points_tensor.shape[2] != self.num_joints:
157  raise InvalidTrajectoryCommandException("Trajectory should account for num of joints.")
158 
159  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
160 
161  self.controller_manager.switch_mode(ControllerType.TRAJECTORY)
162 
163  num_points = points_tensor.shape[0]
164  time_from_start = time_per_step
165  time_from_start_duration = rospy.Duration(time_from_start)
166  msg = JointTrajectory()
167  msg.points = []
168  for i in range(num_points):
169  point = JointTrajectoryPoint()
170  point.positions = list(points_tensor[i, 0])
171  point.velocities = list(points_tensor[i, 1])
172  point.accelerations = list(points_tensor[i, 2])
173  point.time_from_start = time_from_start_duration
174  time_from_start += time_per_step
175  time_from_start_duration = rospy.Duration(time_from_start)
176  msg.points.append(point)
177  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
178  msg.header.frame_id = '/base_link'
179  msg.joint_names = list(self.names)
180 
181  self.traj_pub.publish(msg)
182 
183  def joint_state_callback(self, data):
184  """
185  callback that takes care of the joint state data.
186  """
187  self.joint_data = data
188  if self.names is None:
189  names_arr = np.array(self.joint_data.name)
190  arr = np.isin(names_arr, self.ignore_joints_arr)
191  indices = np.squeeze(np.argwhere(arr == False)) # noqa: E712
192  self.valid_indices = indices
193  self.names = names_arr[self.valid_indices]
194  self.mapping = {v: i for i, v in enumerate(self.names)}
195  self.positions = {name: 0.0 for name in self.names}
196 
197  # construct mapping on joint names to indices
198  self.data_exists = True
199 
200  def get_publishers(self, controller_names):
201  """
202  gets position, velocity, and trajectory publisher(s). Lengths may
203  be different.
204  """
205  joint_position_pubs = []
206  joint_velocity_pubs = []
207  pos_controller_names = controller_names[0]
208  vel_controller_names = controller_names[1]
209  traj_controller_name = controller_names[2][0]
210  traj_name = '/{}/command'.format(traj_controller_name)
211  traj_pub = rospy.Publisher(traj_name, JointTrajectory, queue_size=1)
212 
213  for name in pos_controller_names:
214  pub = rospy.Publisher('/{}/command'.format(name), Float64,
215  queue_size=10)
216  joint_position_pubs.append(pub)
217 
218  for name in vel_controller_names:
219  pub = rospy.Publisher('/{}/command'.format(name), Float64,
220  queue_size=10)
221  joint_velocity_pubs.append(pub)
222 
223  return joint_position_pubs, joint_velocity_pubs, traj_pub
